snippet.title: Q: Difficulty accessing json file with d3 and flask
snippet.description: I am using Flask as a web framework, and I am trying to implement the first example from the book Getting Started with D3, by Mike Dewar. I have a Python script named run.py and two directories … in run.py: #!/usr/bin/env python from flask import Flask, render_template, url_for app = Flask(__name__) @app.route('/') def index(): return render_template('index.html') if __name__=="__main__ …
